H0.text: Which country declared a state of emergency on 8 November 2005 as a result of prolonged rioting, allegedly provoked by the death of 2 teenagers. Belgium

H1.text: Which country declared a state of emergency on 8 November 2005 as a result of prolonged rioting, allegedly provoked by the death of 2 teenagers. Greece

H2.text: Which country declared a state of emergency on 8 November 2005 as a result of prolonged rioting, allegedly provoked by the death of 2 teenagers. United Kingdom

H3.text: Which country declared a state of emergency on 8 November 2005 as a result of prolonged rioting, allegedly provoked by the death of 2 teenagers. FRANCE

A4.text: President Jacques Chirac declared a state of emergency on 8 November.

A5.text: Three teenagers were chased by the police, climbed a wall to hide in a power substation, where two died from electrocution, resulting in a power blackout.
